name: Larger Favorite Post on Profile
description: Makes the Favorite post on a users profile a little bigger so you can see more of the image without it cutting off! :) Note: Favorite Post that are not screenshots and are handwritten post instead will repeat! Update 10/7/15: Fixed since the October 7th update broke stuff.
